title: skin shard reroll of the same skin type?
body:
Hi,
I was wondering,

 If I reroll 3 Legacy skins shards, will I get a permanent Legacy Skin? Same goes with let's say a legendary skin shard.... If i reroll 3 Legendary skins shards, will I get a permanent Legendary Skin?

Thank you

replies.body: Re-rolling is completely random and the shards you use in the process doesn't influence what you get.
Thank you all for your help

It seems to be completely random. There are youtube videos showing rr 3 legendary skins and get 1 520RP skin...
I got a permanent legendary teemo skin by rr 3 520 skin around 4~6 months ago. Not sure if the mechanisms remain the same or not.

[Hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) is random, so you're not guaranteed any type of permanent from rerolling.  To be clear, rerolling 3 legacy shards would still yield a random permanent.  I hope that helps!
